moves.name: Pound
moves.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Thunder Shock
moves.description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: The user hurls mud in the target's face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Parabolic Charge
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

moves.name: Thunder Wave
moves.description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

moves.name: Bulldoze
moves.description: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is reduced.

moves.name: Volt Switch
moves.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: Electrify
moves.description: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target's move becomes Electric type.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
